subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin, who has established himself as the playoffs’ most valuable player, carried the Penguins to a victory over the Red Wings, leveling the Stanley Cup finals at two games apiece.
snippet: Evgeni Malkin, who has established himself as the playoffs’ most valuable player, carried the Penguins to a victory over the Red Wings, leveling the Stanley Cup finals at two games apiece.
